name: Last One
description:
Game jam project.  You are advance AI robot that has a mission to explore the universe.   One day you stumble across shattered planet and decide to look around and see if you can find anything that could explain what happened.

NOTE: if you think it's a dead end and you cannot proceed forward, try to look around, maybe you can reveal some hidden messages). Also press Escape to open menu.

People that worked on this project:

Developers: Bruno, Mirko

Design: Karlo, Bepina

Sound: Alex

Assets from itch.io :

Easy Animated Enemy Pack - Jan 2019

Animated Robot by Quaternius
